answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Shannon, 
We have many examples on the Knowledge Network of municipal annexation policies. 
-The Annexation Topic Page has all of the resources related to annexation on the Knowledge Network all in one place. Here you can find blog posts, documents, articles, questions, and more. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/11/Annexation
-Here is an annexation success story from Gainesville, FL. http://icma.org/en/Article/101565/Mobilizing_Voters__The_Story_of_a_Successful_Annexation_Campaign
-Annexation policy resolution. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13700/Annexation_Policy_Resolution
-Here is an annexation policy guide. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13698/Annexation_Policy
I hope you find these resources useful and that once you craft your own annexation policy on the Knowledge Network!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org


Hi Shannon, 

We have many examples on the Knowledge Network of municipal annexation policies. 

-The Annexation Topic Page has all of the resources related to annexation on the Knowledge Network all in one place. Here you can find blog posts, documents, articles, questions, and more. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/11/Annexation

Best, 
Robin Saywitz
